AbilityTemplate.Name: Magic Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Hurl a magical bolt at the enemy. The missile homes in on the target and does 40 damage in a 3 meter radius on contact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Ward of Arrows
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Adds 20% physical resistance for 15 seconds to the caster.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Petty Heal
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Heals the caster for 20 health every second for 5 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Foetid Cloud
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A sickly short ranged poisonous gas cloud.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Enchant Weapon
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Buff a target ally's weapon to do additional magic damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Aura of Resistance
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 20% physical resistance for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Strength Of Combat
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Adds 20% physical damage bonus for 15 seconds to the caster.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Dust Storm
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Dry winds from the desert knocks down victims and applies minor damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Fireball
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: There is nothing quite as welcoming as a fireball to the face. Does 80 damage in a 3 meter radius and imbues the burning statuseffect for 5 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Cinder Blast
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Hurl fragments of solidified lava at the enemy dealing medium damage on contact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Bolt of Aqshy
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A fast moving flaming bolt that does medium damage on impact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Sear
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Blast the enemy with a short ranged searing flame attack that does medium damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Flaming Sword of Rhuin
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Buff the weapons of allies in a 5 meter radius with the Flaming trait for 20 seconds. The weapons burst into fire and burn every enemy they strike.

AbilityTemplate.Name: The Burning Head
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Conjure a large burning skull that moves forward burning everything in its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Fire Tornado
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A randomly moving fire tornado. Deals high damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Lightning Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Hurl an electric bolt at the enemy that does medium damage on impact.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Wind Blast
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A gust of wind knocks down victims and applies minor damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Chain Lightning
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A ball of lightning that zaps enemies in its area for medium damage.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Harmonic Convergence
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 50% physical resistance for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Iceshard Blizzard
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Stormy clouds loom over the area showering those below with sharp shards of ice.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Comet of Casandora
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A large meteor strikes the area killing all below in a giant shockwave.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Urannon's Thunderbolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A single large bolt of lightning crashes down from the skies with a sizeable electric charge.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Shem's Burning Gaze
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A bolt of cleansing energy fly from the caster's hands, searing evil wherever it strikes.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Assault of Stone
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Launch a small number of stones at the enemy - Monthy Python style.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Healing Light
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in the area of effect regenerate health over time.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Pha's Protection
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 50% physical resistance for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Deathly Shards
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Sharp shards of light fly towards the target piercing through the toughest armor.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Pillar of Radiance
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A large pillar of light applies high damage to those caught in the beam.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Radiant Gaze
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Columns of light raise from the ground in a path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Gaze of Nagash
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A bolt of Dhar fly from the caster's eyes, and what flesh they touch blackens and withers, peeling away completely to reveal bleached white bone beneath.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Raise the Dead
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Raise old bones from the ground. Summon 5 Skeletons for the duration of any single battle.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Shadowblood
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Shadowy orbs of blood fly towards the target staining the ground beneath every step of the way.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Morkharn - Breath of Darkness
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in the area regenerate health over time.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Withering Wave
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A withering wave rolls over randomly the countryside consuming the life energy of those caught within.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Kandorak - The Harbinger
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Raise 4 Grave Guard for the remainder of the battle.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Screaming Skull
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Conjure a screaming skull dripping with acid that moves forward damaging everything in its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Wind of Death
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Invoke the spirits of the dead to consume the souls of the living. Applies high damage while moving along its path.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Grave Call
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Raise 15 Skeleton Champions.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Chillwind
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: The caster assails the enemy with a freezing gale.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Doom Bolt
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A crackling black bolt of energy that explodes in a fireball and sets victims on fire.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Soul Drain
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: A black cloud looms over the targeted area striking those below with arcane lightning bolts.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Power of Darkness
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 20% physical bonus damage for 15 seconds.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Arnzipal's Black Horror
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: The caster tears down the walls between realities, and a black cloud of roiling energy sweeps across the battlefield. As the darkness travels, slimy tentacles lash out from its depths, draggin unfortunate victims screaming to an unknown fate.

AbilityTemplate.Name: Soul Stealer
AbilityTemplate.TooltipDescription: Enemies in the area experience a soul draining direct damage over time effect causing them to take 12 damage every second for 10 seconds.
